page.title: 06Whiteley Village-Recreation
page.content: Entertainments and games were provided for the residents. Outside there was a bowling green, a croquet lawn and a putting green. The village hall has a stage for concerts, a valuable grand piano and can be used to show films, and for whist drives or old-time dancing. There are clubs for scrabble, amateur dramatics, dancing, bowls and many more. They have an annual show of the things they have made or grown. The club-house includes a bar and snooker and pool tables. It also holds a small exhibition about the history of {Whiteley Village.} More fun can be had on coach trips to the sea or the country.
